name: Nike Air Zoom GT Cut
description: The first of Nike's new GT series, the Air Zoom GT Cut is a low-profile high-performance basketball shoe reminiscent of the Kobe 8.

name: Nike G.T. Cut 2
description: The G.T. Cut 2 helps you stop in an instant and accelerate back into the open lane in a low-to-the-ground design that helps minimise court contact while switching direction

name: Freak 5 EP
description: Enter the Freak 5. Stacked with stunning speed for super-quick first steps, stuffed with that sort of springy cushioning that can withstand the all-game grind.

name: LeBron XXI 'Abalone' EP
description: The LeBron XXI has a cabling system that works with Zoom Air cushioning and a light, low-to-the-ground design.

name: Luka 2 'The Pitch' PF
description: The Pitch' is an homage to Luka's time as a pro baller in Madrid and his childhood hero's iconic boots.

name: Tatum 1 'Denim' PF
description: Jayson Tatum is known for his off-court looks as much as his on-court moves (well, almost).

name: Zion 1 x Naruto
description: Believe it! Inspired by Naruto's heroics, this special Zion 1 combines his chakra with the latest in on-court tech.

name: Nike Air Force 1 '07
description: The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07, the basketball original that puts a fresh spin on what you know best.

name: AIR JORDAN I
description: Jordan Brand is celebrating the release of Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse with a special edition Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG.

name: Nike SB Dunk Low Premium
description: The '80s b-ball icon returns with mixed materials and hoops flair. Channelling vintage style back onto the streets.

name: ANTA KAI 1
description: With the ANTA KAI 1, quick cuts come with ease, echoing Kyrie's own agility in outmaneuvering his opponents.

name: Nike Air Max 90 LV8
description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries.

name: Nike Icon Classic SE
description: This strappy take on the classic AF-1 is just as easy to wear as your favourite sneakers

name: AE1
description: Anthony Edwards adidas Basketball shoes have officially been unveiled.

name: Nike Precision 6 FlyEase
description: Create space, stop in an instant, shoot off the dribble in the Nike Precision 6 FlyEase.

name: Nike G.T. Cut 3 EP
description: How can you separate your game when it's winning time? Start by lacing up in the G.T. Cut 3.

name: Nike Dunk Low
description: The Nike Dunk Low is an easy score for your wardrobe.

name: Nike Go FlyEase
description: These kicks feature Nike's revolutionary FlyEase technology, making on-and-off a breeze.

name: KD16 ASW EP
description: He'd be just as happy playing casual all afternoon as he would be dropping 40-pieces in the playoffs.

name: Book 1 EP
description: Book's signature shoe gives him the tools he needs to carve.
